alert.note: Alert for Box Butte (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:57AM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Box Butte County through 1230 AM MDT... At 1156 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Hemingford, or 22 miles northwest of Alliance, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alliance, Hemingford, Wild Horse Butte and Berea. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
